amendment.description: An amendment numbered 9 printed in Part B of House Report 115-712 to prohibit the use of funds for enforcing the EPA's abandonment criteria for prior converted cropland.

vote.text: On agreeing to the LaMalfa amendment (A043) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A043) offered by Mr. LaMalfa.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the LaMalfa amendment (A043) Agreed to by voice vote.
